keyboardHelpDialog.twentyScreen.moveGrab.value: Move Grabbed Object in Counting Area

keyboardHelpDialog.moveGrabbedObjectToOp.value: Move Grabbed Object to Opposite Side

automaticallyHearPhraseDescription.value: Hear phrase read automatically each time addends change. When toggled on, auto-read phrase may interfere with screen readers.

numberModelTypeDescription.value: Choose between a traditional number bond representation or a proportional bar model.

sumScreenNumberModelOrientationDescripti.value: On the sum screen only, this changes the orientation of the total in the number decomposition model.

level3.value: Missing addend in a decomposition equation (10 only)

level4.value: Missing addend in a sum equation (10 only)

level6.value: Missing addend in a decomposition equation (11-20)

level7.value: Missing addend or total in a sum equation (11-20)

playArea.value: There are left and right counting areas with fun objects. You can organize objects inside a counting area or move them between counting areas to break total apart in different ways. A decomposition phrase and a  { $numberBarOrBarModel} represent the total number broken apart into two addends. Additionally, choose any total from 0 to 10, automatically organize objects into rows, or swap addends.

controlArea.value: Reset the sim to start over.

objectsPattern.value:
{ $count ->
  [one] Currently, { $count } object is in counting area.
 *[other] Currently, { $count } objects are in counting areas.
}

bothHidden.value: Currently, both counting areas are hidden.

interactionHint.value: Count or grab an object. Organize or move objects in counting area to play.

description.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [numberLine] There is a number line broken into yellow and blue sections that can change with a movable knob to show how total is broken apart.
 *[other] There are yellow and blue objects you can move to organize or change color to change how total is broken apart.
} A decomposition phrase, a { $numberBarOrBarModel }, and equation  represent how total is broken apart into two addends. Additionally, choose any total from 0 to 10,  automatically organize objects, or swap addends.

countingAreaShown.value: Currently, counting area shows { $count } { $itemType } broken into colors. A phrase, { $numberBarOrBarModel} and equation show how total is broken apart.

countingAreaShownWithNumberLine.value: Currently, counting area shows total of { $count } broken into two sections with addend splitter. A phrase, { $numberBarOrBarModel }, and equation show how total is broken apart.

countingAreaHidden.value: Currently, counting area is hidden. A phrase, { $numberBarOrBarModel } and equation show how total is broken apart.

beads.value: Navigate to and grab bead to create groups, or move it across divider to change color.

kittens.value: Choose kitten to move, organize, or change its color.

numberLine.value: Move addend splitter knob to change how total is broken apart.

releasedHelpText.value: Use arrows or W, A, S, D keys to navigate and choose { $item } to move. Space or enter to grab or release.

grabbedHelpTextPattern.value:
{ $representationType ->
    [beads]   Move one or more beads to create groups.
    *[other]  Move { $item } in or between left and right counting areas.
}

numberBondLeadingParagraph.value: Number bond has { $total } in top circle

barModelLeadingParagraph.value: Bar model has { $total } in top rectangle

kittenPattern.value:
{ $descriptor ->
    [first] First { $color} Kitten 
    [last] Last { $color } Kitten 
    [only] Only { $color } Kitten 
    *[other] { $color } Kitten
}

withAttributeSwitch.value: Move freely to create groups with arrows or W, A, S, D keys. Change color with space or enter.

withoutAttributeSwitch.value: Optionally, count or organize kittens to help solve challenge.

accessibleHelpText.value: Counting area with grabbable and movable beads.

contextResponse.value:
{ $grabbedOrReleased ->
  [ grabbed ]  Grabbed
 *[ released ] Released
}, { $side -> 
  [left] left
 *[right] right
} of divider.

crossedDividerContextResponse.value:
{ $side ->
  [left] Bead now yellow on left.
 *[right] Bead now blue on right.
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Move knob to change how addends are split.

contextResponse.value:
{ $addendsShowing ->
  [ addendsVisible ] { $total } is split into { $left } and { $right }.
 *[ addendsHidden ]  { $total } is split into { $sections ->
                                                  [ smallerAndLarger ] smaller and larger
                                                  [ equal ]           equal
                                                 *[ largerAndSmaller ]  larger and smaller
  } sections.
}

leadingCountOn.value: Number line shows a green line to represent total and a blue jump from knob to total:

leadingCountFromZero.value: Number line shows a green line to represent total, a yellow jump from left edge to knob, and a blue jump from knob to total:

countOnLeftAddendPattern.value: Left addend, { $left }, marked on number line

countOnJumpPattern.value: Jump of length { $right } starts at { $start } and ends at total

countFromZeroLeftAddendPattern.value: Left addend, { $left }, is shown above jump from left edge to knob

countFromZeroRightAddendPattern.value: Right addend, { $right }, is shown above jump from { $start } to total

accessibleHelpText.value: Show or hide the sum of the two addends.

accessibleHelpTextCollapsed.value: Phrase tells how total is decomposed.

noVoiceAccessibleParagraph.value: There is no voice found on this device for the selected language. Your device may support downloading additional voices for this language.

accessibleHelpText.value: Choose between two languages to hear and read phrase.

numberBondAccessibleParagraph.value: Number bond has three circles arranged with one circle on top and two underneath like a triangle. Top circle tells total number of objects, left circle is left addend, right circle is right addend.

currentNumberBondStateAccessibleParagrap.value: Right now, { $total } in top circle. { $left } in left circle, { $right } in right circle.

barModelAccessibleParagraph.value: Two matching rectangles are stacked on top of each other. Top rectangle is not split and tells total number of objects, bottom rectangle is split into two sections that adjust based on size of addends.

currentBarModelStateAccessibleParagraph.value: Right now, { $total } in top rectangle. { $left } and { $right } in bottom rectangle, split into { $proportions } sections.

accessibleHelpText.value:
{ $representationType ->
  [kittens] Group by color, up to 5 kittens per row.
  [beads] Group by color, up to 5 beads per group.
  *[other] Each group has a maximum of 5 { $representation }.
}

accessibleHelpTextPattern.value: Switch { $items } from left counting area to right and right counting area to left.
Show or hide counting area and both addends in { $modelRepresentation }.
Show or hide { $addend } counting area and { $addend } addend in { $modelRepresentation }.

accessibleHelpText.value: Add or remove from the { $addend } addend.
Choose where to start counting. Count on from first addend to get total or count to first addend starting at zero.
Show or hide the sum of the two addends.

accessibleContextResponseChecked.value: Addends are { $leftAddend } and { $rightAddend }, labeled on number line.

accessibleHelpText.value: Show or hide tick mark numbers on number line.
Show or hide total jump on number line.

incorrectAnswer.value: { $guess } is incorrect. Try a different number.

accessibleHelpText.value: Reset the current challenge to try again.

labelInnerContent.value: Move grabbed { $item } to { $addend } side with { $key } key.
Adjust number of objects with arrow keys.

jumpToFirstLabelInnerContent.value: Jump to first kitten with Home key.

jumpToLastLabelInnerContent.value: Jump to last kitten with End key.

changeColorLabelInnerContent.value: Change color with Space or Enter key.
